statements: UPDATE Manuscripts SET author = 'John Doe', year_published = 2005 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Manuscripts SET content = 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.' WHERE title = 'Sample Manuscript';
UPDATE Manuscripts SET title='The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Manuscripts SET year_published=1892, author='Arthur Conan Doyle' WHERE title='Pride and Prejudice';
UPDATE manuscripts SET author='John Smith', year_published=2021 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE literary_works SET genre='Fiction', content='Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE manuscripts SET author='Jane Doe', genre='Fiction' WHERE year_published=2005 AND title='The Secret Garden';
UPDATE literary_works SET genre='Poetry', author='John Smith', content='Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.' WHERE id=101;
UPDATE Manuscripts SET author='Jane Doe', title='New Title' WHERE id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE LiteraryWorks SET genre='Fiction', content='Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet' WHERE id='223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE Manuscripts SET author = 'Jane Austen', published_date = '1813-01-28' WHERE title = 'Pride and Prejudice';
UPDATE LiteraryWorks SET genre = 'Classic', author = 'Mark Twain', content = 'A river, a boy, and an adventure.' WHERE title = 'The Adventures of Huckleberry Finn';
UPDATE manuscripts SET title='New Title', author='New Author' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE locations SET city='New City', country='New Country' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE manuscripts SET year_published = 2000, author = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE Manuscripts SET author = 'Mark Twain' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE LiteraryWorks SET year_published = 1900 WHERE id = 2;

UPDATE LiteraryWorks SET genre = 'Fiction', author = 'JK Rowling' WHERE year_published = 2005;
